verses.verse: A Song of Ascents. Out of the depths <S%H4615><s%> have I cried <S%H7121><s%> unto thee <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah.
Lord <S%H136><s%>, hear <S%H8085><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%>: Let thine ears <S%H241><s%> be attentive <S%H7183><s%> To the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my supplications <S%H8469><s%>.
If thou <S%H3050><s%>, Jehovah, shouldest mark <S%H8104><s%> iniquities <S%H5771><s%>, O Lord <S%H136><s%>, who could stand <S%H5975><s%>?
But there is forgiveness <S%H5547><s%> with thee <S%H3372><s%>, That thou mayest be feared.
I wait <S%H6960><s%> for Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, my soul <S%H5315><s%> doth wait <S%H6960><s%>, And in his word <S%H1697><s%> do I hope <S%H3176><s%>.
My soul <S%H5315><s%> waiteth for the Lord <S%H136><s%> More than watchmen <S%H8104><s%> wait for the morning <S%H1242><s%>; Yea <S%H8104><s%>, more than watchmen for the morning <S%H1242><s%>.

O Israel <S%H3478><s%>, hope <S%H3176><s%> in Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; For with Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> there is lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%>, And with him is plenteous <S%H7235><s%> redemption <S%H6304><s%>.
And he will redeem <S%H6299><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> From all his iniquities <S%H5771><s%>.
